attributes.action: save the beautiful Kings Meadow area of Reading town centre from additional development.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Say ‘No’ to more development on the floodplain at Kings Meadow and to the reduction of this riverside green space.

Please sign this petition to voice your opposition against plans to develop this beautiful open green space.

Reading Borough Council is currently considering plans to build upon and expand the existing footprint of the disused Grade II swimming baths. This additional ‘upwards and sideways’ development on the River Thames's floodplain at Kings Meadow, will take away the open character of the meadow and add another visual blot to the town’s precious riverside landscape.

Please don't let this happen. It is vital that we preserve the tranquillity and freedom of the riverside.  Sign this petition now.

Thank you.

rejection.details: We suggest you contact Reading Borough Council in the first instance.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
